about_the_game:
Notice: Only the blueprints of the following items are included. You can't craft them until your crafting skill reaches certain levels. Please think twice before purchasing this pack.
  • Green Bamboo Sword
  • Bamboo Shadow Machete
  • Mottled Bamboo Axe
  • Bamboo Leaf Bayonet
  • Bamboo Long Knife
  • Hardy Bamboo Spear
  • Bamboo Heavy Sword
  • Bamboo Stone Hammer
  • Bamboo Chair
  • Bamboo Table
  • Bamboo Shelf
  • Bamboo Screen
  • Bamboo Chest
  • Bamboo Foundation

  • Bamboo Window Frame

  • Bamboo Fence Gate

  • Enamel Spear
You can view them in Artisanry after purchasing this pack.

developers: 上海润梦网络科技有限公司
name: The Swordsmen X: Green-bamboo pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500或AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700或AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

publishers: 上海润梦网络科技有限公司
